subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Instead of the Mets dancing by the mound and celebrating a division title that will soon be theirs, the Pirates mobbed Joe Randa, who scored the winning run on Ronny Paulino’s ninth-inning double.
snippet: Instead of the Mets dancing by the mound and celebrating a division title that will soon be theirs, the Pirates mobbed Joe Randa, who scored the winning run on Ronny Paulino’s ninth-inning double.
